text: Lokera apanara kache natuna camda samparke prasna kare [1]. Baluna, ‘eta manusa ebam hajera jan'ya samaya-nirdesaka.’ Ara pichana dika diye ghare prabesa karate kono punya ne'i [2]; baram punya ache ke'u taka'oya abalambana karale. Kaje'i tomara ghare prabesa kara daraja diye ebam tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara, yate tomara saphalakama hate para
